name: Holestuck
description:
In August 2015, Ryan North and his dog Chompsky got stuck in a skatebowl while out for a walk. With the help of the Internet, his quest turned into a live-action adventure game, and he got out.

As part of Udemy's Learn to Code by Making Games course - specifically Section 2, where we make text adventure games - I recreated Ryan's journey, with some artistic license.

In the future I would like to add music and change the images depending on the scene. Also I need to make a way to quit the game.

I'm really new to coding in Unity/C# so this was a pretty big step!
